Text: and thanks so much uploader ! you don't know how thankfull i am actualy because this is a suuuper rare anime that i couldn't find in any website >_>
Yup, I know it was hard for me to find this several years ago.  After telling a bunch of friends about it and that it was one of my favorites, I decided to make a torrent of it.
Actually, I had to remake this torrent 'cause it wasn't working.  Something about the Pirate Bay tracker wasn't playing well with it.  So it's now on demonoid.
